tool_description: Generates visualization data for taxonomy hierarchies to enable graphical representation of label relationships.

taxonomy_id.description: ID of the taxonomy to visualize

visualization_type.description: Type of visualization: tree, network, or sunburst

max_display_depth.description: Maximum hierarchy depth to include in visualization

include_usage_stats.description: Whether to include usage statistics in visualization data

error_messages: Taxonomy not found: The specified taxonomy_id does not exist.
Empty taxonomy: Cannot visualize taxonomy with no labels.
Depth limit exceeded: max_display_depth must be positive if specified.
usage: Provide taxonomy_id and select visualization_type. Optionally set max_display_depth and include_usage_stats. The tool returns structured data for creating hierarchy visualizations.

visualization_data.description: Structured data for visualization rendering (JSON format)

node_count.description: Total number of nodes in the visualization

edge_count.description: Total number of connections between nodes

max_depth_shown.description: Maximum depth level included in visualization

layout_recommendations.description: Suggested layout parameters for optimal visualization
